last_episode_to_air.name: Reasonable Doubt?
last_episode_to_air.overview: New theories emerge after the guilty verdict of Scott Peterson. A look into the appeal after the verdict

name: The Murder of Laci Peterson
overview: Nearing the 15th anniversary of Laci Peterson's disappearance, A&E Networks takes a fresh look at the case. A definitive factual account by those who lived and breathed it every day.

episodes.name: Missing in Modesto
episodes.overview: Laci Peterson's disappearance, A&E Networks takes a fresh look at the case. A definitive factual account by those who lived and breathed it every day.

episodes.name: Media Frenzy
episodes.overview: The appearance of Amber Frey, Scott Peterson's girlfriend, causes a media frenzy around the Laci Peterson disappearance case.

episodes.name: Most Hated Man in America
episodes.overview: After the discovery of the bodies of Laci Peterson and her son in San Francisco Bay, police arrest Scott Peterson who becomes the most hated man in America.

episodes.name: The Trial Begins
episodes.overview: After the prosecution asks for the death penalty for the murders of Laci and Connor Peterson, the defense counters that Scott is "stone cold innocent"

episodes.name: The Verdict
episodes.overview: The jury wrestles with the evidence but eventually produces the expected verdict.

episodes.name: Reasonable Doubt?
episodes.overview: New theories emerge after the guilty verdict of Scott Peterson. A look into the appeal after the verdict
